thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Linda E
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Linda E

author: Linda E
title: Linda E
text:
After discovering how difficult it was finding a good company to install my solar... I went to the team at solar Quote: s to see which local companies they might suggest to me.
It was immediate and very helpful...All 3 companies I was sent, responded immediately and with very honest information. I have to remove a palm tree first for a successful result from my panels, no other companies I had found for myself told me this, they were all ready to put panels on. which would not have worked in a full capacity.
I will not hesitate to choose one of their suggestions after I can get the palm removed... Thanks, Finn and the team from Solar Quote: s.
